title: Shark
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A sharp-toothed predatory denizen of the waters, the shark evolved over millions of years into an almost perfect killing machine. |

## Useful Info

**Sharks** are aquatic pests which are much less dangerous than you'd expect. They deal slightly more damage than [giant goldfish](/Giant_goldfish "Giant goldfish"), and trade a little more [AC](/AC "AC") for a little less [EV](/EV "EV"). So long as you face them while standing on the shore, they aren't too much of a threat. They can be found in [the Shoals](/The_Shoals "The Shoals").

## Tips & Tricks

- Ranged attacks or [poison](/Poison "Poison") will help keep them from fleeing out to sea.

## History

Sharks were removed in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15").
html:
Shark

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
shark ; 
HP 23-52
HD 7
XP 205
Speed 10
AC 9
EV 5
Will 28
Attack1 18 (bite: plain)
Attack2 9 (bite: plain)


Resistances rDrown, rWater
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Water
Intelligence Reptile
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Big
Type shark, shark
Flags Blood scent
Cold-blooded
No skeleton
Submerges
A sharp-toothed predatory denizen of the waters, the shark evolved over millions of years into an almost perfect killing machine.


Useful Info

Sharks are aquatic pests which are much less dangerous than you'd expect. They deal slightly more damage than giant goldfish, and trade a little more AC for a little less EV. So long as you face them while standing on the shore, they aren't too much of a threat. They can be found in the Shoals.

Tips & Tricks

  • Ranged attacks or poison will help keep them from fleeing out to sea.

History

Sharks were removed in 0.15.

So long as you face them while standing on the shore, they aren't too much of a threat. They can be found in [[the Shoals]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *Ranged attacks or [[poison]] will help keep them from fleeing out to sea. ==History== Sharks were removed in [[0.15]].
